response.overview: We follow the unique journeys of first-time surrogate Gina, mother of four, who is pregnant with twins for another couple; Kelly, mother of two, who is entering into her third surrogacy at the age of 25; and Glenda and Bonnie, mother/daughter surrogates who share an unusual bond. We meet the intended parents and surro-babies born to these women, learn who hires a surrogate and why, and delve into the fascinating world of Surrogate Stories.
response.title: Surrogate Stories
